author: gstein
msg: missed one. This is needed to build the new aputil library.

author: gstein
msg: *) Put lib/aputil/ into the INCLUDES path
*) add a Makefile.in to test/ to help with building test programs (these are
not part of the build; just manual compiles right now)
*) add test/dbu.c as a quick test of apu_dbm

author: gstein
msg: Start the oft-discussed, but oft-punted lib/aputil library. Drop in a first
cut at an "any" DBM set of cover functions.

author: gstein
msg: *) Compensate for recent changes in the APR headers. Specifically, some
files need to specifically include stdio.h, or a particular apr_*.h
